# maskedmashr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package fits masked-mash model to multivariate Z scores.

## Installation

You can install the development version of maskedmashr like so:

```{r,eval=F}
devtools::install_github('DongyueXie/maskedmashr')
```
